title: [15 YoE, Unemployed, Sales, USA]
text:
Jordan Taylor  
(555) 013-7842 | jordan.taylor@email.example | Raleigh, NC | linkedin.com/in/jordantaylor  

Experienced in sales, property management, customer service, and operations coordination across healthcare, real  
estate, and corporate environments. Skilled in client acquisition, negotiation, communication, and relationship  
management. Adept at identifying customer needs, presenting solutions, and closing deals. Seeking to apply my  
customer service and negotiation skills in a dynamic sales environment.  

Skills  
Technical: Microsoft Office Suite, Google Docs, Canva, Basic Graphic Design, Zoom, Slack  

Sales and Client Relations: Customer Service, Contract Negotiation, Marketing Strategies, Market Research  

Operations and Administration: Office Coordination, Scheduling, Calendar Management, Data Entry, Records  
Management, Budgeting  

Soft Skills: Collaboration, Teamwork, Problem-Solving, Time Management, Adaptability  

Experience  
Property Manager  
Pinecrest Residential Management                                                                 Nov 2022 - Jun 2025  
• Managed day-to-day administrative operations, including scheduling, budgeting, and record-keeping.  
• Maintained an average 95% occupancy rate through targeted marketing, property showings, and consistent  
  follow-up.  
• Handled client communications, contracts, and financial transactions, delivering efficient, reliable, and  
  client-focused service.  
• Negotiated lease terms and pricing, increasing lease renewals by 20% through relationship building.  
• Researched local market trends to adjust pricing strategies.  
• Promoted property upgrades and add-ons, improving tenant satisfaction and overall revenue.  

Quality Assurance Tester  
BluePeak Digital                                                                          Aug 2019 - Feb 2020  
• Tested company website for functionality, regression, responsiveness, accessibility, and performance across  
  multiple Apple devices and locales.  
• Worked in an Agile environment and participated in all SCRUM meetings including daily stand-ups, sprint  
  planning, grooming sessions, and retrospectives.  
• Collaborated with developers to identify, prioritize and resolve bugs effectively.  

Administrative Associate  
Greenway Family Medicine                                                                    Jan 2017 - Jul 2017  
• Scheduled and registered an average of 50+ patient appointments daily.  
• Managed data entry, insurance verification, and medical billing using EPIC software.  
• Processed patient payments, check-ins, and check-outs efficiently.  
• Assisted physicians and staff with medical records management and coordination.  

Administrative Associate  
Lakeside Medical Group                                                                     Dec 2010 - Jan 2017  
• Streamlined the patient check-in process, reducing average wait times by 10 minutes.  
• Facilitated communication between patients, physicians, and pharmacies, ensuring accurate prescription  
  processing.  
• Maintained confidential medical and financial records in compliance with HIPAA regulations.  
• Entered and updated patient data in EHR Systems (Practice Fusion and Allscripts).  
• Managed general office troubleshooting and workflow improvements.  

Education  
BS, Biological Sciences  
North Carolina State University - Graduated 2015
